title: Stairway to Evan
description: Evan’s had kind of a boring sex life. Aside from a few times in the shower, he’s only ever done it in bed. Enter co-worker Kenzo and a New Year’s resolution to eat better and exercise more. When the guys grab some weights and climb the stairs together, an office romance blossoms into Stairway to Evan. A gay erotic romance by G.R. Richards. Perfect length for your lunch break or commute!
author: G.R. Richards
